data.eml:eml: Two new species of Amphinemura (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) from Yunnan, China, with the redescription of A. triramia (Wu, 1962)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Weihai, Yang, Ding (2008): Two new species of Amphinemura (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) from Yunnan, China, with the redescription of A. triramia (Wu, 1962). Zootaxa 1926: 61-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184824
